SpecialElementType.Name: Honed Edge
SpecialElementType.Title: Honed Edge Attribute
SpecialElementType.Desc: <color=#F0D12B>Honed Edge</color> calculates damage and buffs based on <color=#F0D12B>Physical</color> attributes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> while accumulating <color=#F0D12B>Honed Edge Anomaly Buildup</color> on enemies, triggering <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> and applying <color=#F0D12B>Flinch</color>. <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> interrupts enemy actions and deals massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>; <color=#F0D12B>Flinch</color> increases the Daze the target takes for a period of time.

3114310.Name: Yuzuha: Tanuki Under the Shade
3114310.Desc: Can you tell what the umbrella conceals? A tanuki, a trap, a ghost, or a girl's sly, spirited smile?

Description.Name: Basic Attack:
Basic Attack: Sword Aura
Basic Attack: Sword Stance - Earth
Basic Attack: Sword Stance - Earth Style Third Form
Basic Attack: Sword Stance - Earth Secret Art
Basic Attack: Sword Stance - Heaven
Basic Attack: Sword Stance - Heaven Style Third Form
Basic Attack: Sword Stance - Earth Style Third Form
Basic Attack: Sword Stance - Earth Secret Art
Basic Attack: Sword Stance - Heaven Style Third Form
Dodge:
Dash Attack:
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Retraction Slash
Description.Desc:
In <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Stance]</color>, when not moving the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick}, press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
Perform a quick backward slash. If you trigger a Perfect Dodge during this move, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to quickly execute <color=#FFFFFF>[Basic Attack: Sword Stance - Earth Secret Art]</color>.
You are Invulnerable during activation.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter:
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack:
Special Attack:
Special Attack: Sword Stance - UP
Description.Desc:
In <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Stance]</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Quickly launch an aerial attack, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> to enemies and enter an airborne state.
Character is invulnerable during activation.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack:
EX Special Attack: Sword Stance - Flash
Description.Desc:
In <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Stance]</color>, hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> in mid-air to activate:
Unleash rapid slashes while continuously consuming <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Will]</color> until it's depleted.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Sword Stance - Annihilation
EX Special Attack: Sword Stance - Flash
EX Special Attack: Sword Stance - Annihilation
Chain Attack:
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful slash at enemies ahead in a large area, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Sword Stance
Ultimate:
Ultimate: Sword Stance
Description.Desc:
In <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Stance]</color>, when Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>[Maximum]</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Summon a giant sword, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>;
After using this skill, deactivates <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil: Evil Slayer]</color> and exits <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Stance]</color>, and gains 4 <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Will]</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist:
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist:
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up:
Assist Follow-Up:

Name: Core Passive:
Additional Ability:
Desc:
Triggers when there is a <color=#FFFFFF>[Assist]</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>[Defense]</color> character in the squad:
When an ally activates any <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil]</color> or an enemy activates <color=#FFFFFF>[Miasmic Field]</color>, Ye Shunguang gains the <color=#FFFFFF>[Ready to Strike]</color> effect until all <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil]</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>[Miasmic Field]</color> effects end. This effect cannot stack.
While Ye Shunguang has the <color=#FFFFFF>[Ready to Strike]</color> effect, the next time he enters the field in combat, he will consume the <color=#FFFFFF>[Ready to Strike]</color> effect and unleash his <color=#FFFFFF>[Entry Skill]</color>, activating <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil: Evil Slayer]</color>, entering <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Stance]</color>, and gaining 4 points of <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Will]</color>.

1.Name: PlaceHolder
1.Desc: In <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Stance]</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>[Sky Force]</color> effect won't be consumed and can stack up to 6 floors; when activating <color=#FFFFFF>[EX Special Attack: Sword Stance - Flash]</color> in <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Stance]</color>, each remaining point of <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Will]</color> increases this skill's DMG by 10%.

2.Name: PlaceHolder
2.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Will]</color> cap becomes 6, gain 6 <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Will]</color> when entering or exiting <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Stance]</color> through any means;
After entering <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Stance]</color> by consuming Decibels to activate <color=#FFFFFF>[Ultimate]</color>, you can activate <color=#FFFFFF>[Ultimate: Sword Stance]</color> without consumption until this <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Stance]</color> ends.

4.Name: PlaceHolder
4.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>[Terrain]</color> effect can stack up to 3 times, each stack increases <color=#FFFFFF>[Basic Attack: Sword Stance - Earth Secret Art]</color> DMG by 15%;
Gain one stack of <color=#FFFFFF>[Terrain]</color> when entering combat; gain one stack of <color=#FFFFFF>[Terrain]</color> when exiting <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Stance]</color>.

6.Name: PlaceHolder
6.Desc: When entering <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Stance]</color>, gain one stack of <color=#FFFFFF>[Harmony]</color> for each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>[Terrain]</color> effect; after using <color=#FFFFFF>[Basic Attack: Sword Stance - Heaven Style Third Form]</color>, press the Special Attack button to quickly perform a <color=#FFFFFF>[EX Special Attack: Sword Stance - Flash]</color> without consuming <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Will]</color>; when normally performing <color=#FFFFFF>[EX Special Attack: Sword Stance - Flash]</color> and consuming <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Will]</color>, for each point of <color=#FFFFFF>[Sword Will]</color> consumed, increase <color=#FFFFFF>[EX Special Attack: Sword Stance - Annihilation]</color>'s DMG Multiplier by 10%, up to 60%;
